qas.question: The modern trend in design is toward integration of what?

answers.text: previously separated specialties, especially among large firms

qas.question: Even in large firms, architects, interior designers, engineers, developers, construction managers, and general contractors were more likely to be what?
In modern times, firms may offer themselves as what for a construction project?
What kind of contract is given when the contractor is given a performance specification and must undertake the project from design to construction, while adhering to the performance specifications?
What is the trend in skills among architects?

plausible_answers.text: experts from all related fields as employees

qas.question: What types of employees does and interior design firm usually have?
What do engineers offer themselves as for a project?

plausible_answers.text: the contractor is given a performance specification and must undertake the project from design to construction, while adhering to the performance specifications

qas.question: What is a description of an associated company contract?

plausible_answers.text: architects, interior designers, engineers, developers, construction managers, and general contractors

qas.question: What groups were previously considered to be integrated?
